item.title: Flight Crew/Supernumerary Escape Devices – Inertial Escape Reels Freighter without Draw-Through Smoke Detection System One Upper Deck Slide is Operative

remarks.para: May be inoperative or missing provided:

numlitem.para: One Upper Deck Door/Slide is operative,
The number of flight crewmembers plus supernumeraries is limited to the number of operative escape reels installed, and
Flight deck/upper deck occupants are limited to the number of operative escape reels (4 escape reels).

placard.para: Install Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "____# ESCAPE REELS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Remove inoperative escape reel from descent device container. Ensure that anchor bolt, washer and nut are reinstalled and secured once inoperative descent device has been removed. Enter in aircraft logbook that escape descent device has been removed and that anchor fitting bolt, nut and washer has been reinstalled.
